metadata.name: degen...poet? #1/20
metadata.description:
Happy National Poetry Month!  
SOUND ON ðŸ”Š

"The Space"

Lost in the pixelated maze,  
My spirit ensnared in a digital haze,  
Dreams deferred, a flickering light,  
Seeking a way to break through the night.

Then a butterfly, blue and black,  
Its wings a glitch in reality's track,  
Leading me to a realm unknown,  
Where creativity has overthrown.

Colors burst, a kaleidoscopic array,  
Passion awakens, in a disarray,  
The butterfly shows a path untold,  
Towards a world of wonder to behold.

------------  
This is my first ~full~ Degen Ghosty piece on the ETH blockchain & is unintentionally an homage to @degenpoet for being a huge inspiration to me in the web3 space as a Degen.
